    public class MainWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Class which represents the main window of the app.

      • openImages

        public void openImages(java.util.Map<java.lang.Double,java.util.ArrayList<java.net.URL>> images)
        Opens the images which have been compared to the query image in ascending order. The images will be in a list which will be contained in a inner window.
        Parameters:
        images - map which has the images ordered by their differences.
